column4: Clean Original Dry Hair Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Clean Original Dry Hair Shampoo - Imported (101 ml) Price: Rs.3700

CLEAN Original Dry Hair Shampoo 3. 17 oz (90 g). An oil-absorbing quick fix to maintain a freshly shampooed feeling between washes. Keep your mane fresh without the hassle of washing daily. this no-water-required shampoo harnesses Cotton Vantage a new technology that blends cotton seeds cotton extracts and cotton proteins to help absorb excess oil. this formula s time-released CLEAN fragrance keeps hair smelling fresh. What it is formulated without : - Parabens Sulfates Triclosan this product is not animal tested and does not contain propylene glycol mineral oil animal ingredients or talc. p
